spec: that's still not working.. we want the same colour style we have on the homepage (blues etc) across all pages - but login/signup still white
commitMessage:
Update login and signup pages to match homepage blue gradient style

- Added blue gradient background to match homepage
- Updated card styling with semi-transparent white background
- Added blue accent colors for text and buttons
- Improved input field styling with blue borders
- Added hover effects for better interactivity
